channel.title: National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC)
channel.description: Updated National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) content from the US Environmental Protection Agency

item.title: NDWAC December 5-6, 2016
item.description:
Public meeting materials and documents

  • NDWAC December 6-7, 2016 Agenda (PDF)(2 pp, 53 K, December 5, 2016)
  • Drinking Water Regulatory and Key Actions Update (PDF)(20 pp, 4 MB, December 6, 2016)
  • Drinking Water Implementation Update (PDF)(6 pp, 2 MB, December 6, 2016)
  • Emerging Contaminants/Health Advisories (PDF)(16 pp, 4 MB, December 6, 2016)
  • Transparency – Drinking Water Regulations (PDF)(2 pp, 205 K, December 7, 2016)
item.dc:creator: cwadling

item.title: Public Comments for November 6 & 7, 2014 NDWAC Meeting
item.description:
Comments related to a public meeting on drinking water regulations for approaches to regulating groups of carcinogenic volatile organic chemicals, harmful algal blooms, climate and drinking water issues and other program topics; and options for compliance schedules relative to the Long Term 2 Enhanced Surface Water Treatment Rule.

  • Public Comments for NDWAC Meeting on November 6 & 7, 2014 (PDF)(263 pp, 12 MB)
item.dc:creator: gjasmin

item.title: National Drinking Water Advisory Council November 17 - 19, 2015: Public Meeting Materials
item.description:
The followng documents contain a report and presentations of the November 17 - 19, 2015 NDWAC public meeting.

  • National Drinking Water Advisory Council: Regulatory and Related Updates - Nov 2015 (PDF)(19 pp, 279 K)
    Presentation on regulatory update for the NDWAC
  • Final Recommendationsof the Lead and Copper Rule Working Group To the National Drinking Water Advisory Council - Nov 2015 (PDF)(35 pp, 580 K)
    Overview presenation of final recommended revised Lead and Copper Rule framework
  • Report of the Lead and Copper Rule Working Group - Statement of Dissent (PDF)(23 pp, 499 K)
    Report of long-term revisions for the Lead and Copper Rule (LCR) statement letter
  • U.S. EPA's Efforts to Address Harmful Algal Blooms in Drinking Water (PDF)(16 pp, 650 K)
    Presentation on human health and harmful algal blooms in drinking water
  • Technologies for Legionella Control: Scientific Literature Review (PDF)(18 pp, 810 K)
    Presentation on information States and the Veterans Health Administration (VHA) have requested to provide information on effective strategies for controlling Legionella in buildings
item.dc:creator: gjasmin

item.title: National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Drinking Water Research Working Group
item.description:
A collection of Drinking Water Research Working Group meeting agendas and summaries.  

  • Working Group on Drinking Water Research Mission Statement (PDF)(5 pp, 16 K)
  • November 28-29, 2000 - Research Working Group Meeting Summary (PDF)(14 pp, 72 K, 11/28/2000)
item.dc:creator: ashahan

item.title: National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Underground Injection Control Source Water Working Group Summaries
item.description:
A collection of Underground Injection Control Source Water Working Group meeting executive summaries.  

  • Underground Injection Control / Source Water Protection NDWAC Working Group Roster (PDF)(5 pp, 26 K)
    The National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) was established to provide practical and independent advice, consultation, and recommendations to the Agency on the activities, functions and policies related to the Safe Drinking Water Act (SDWA) as amended
  • March 13 & 14, 1997 Source Water Working Group Executive Summary (PDF)(1 pg, 15 K, March 13, 1997)
    The 25 members of the working group met with NDWAC member, L.D. McMullen, on March 13 and 14, 1997 in Washington
  • January 7-8, 1999 NDWAC UIC/Source Water Program Integration Working Group Executive Summary (PDF)(2 pp, 23 K, January 7, 1999)
    The first meeting of the National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Underground Injection Control (UIC)/ Source Water Protection Program Integration was held on January 7-8, 1999 in Denver, Colorado
  • March 25-26, 1999 NDWAC UIC/ Source Water Program Integration Working Group Executive Summary (PDF)(2 pp, 20 K, March 25, 1999)
    The second meeting of the National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Underground Injection Control (UIC)/ Source Water Protection Program Integration was held on March 25-26, 1999 in Washington, D.C.
item.dc:creator: Anonymous

item.title: National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Drinking Water State Revolving Fund Working Group Summaries
item.description:
A collection of Drinking Water State Revolving Fund Working Group documents.  

  • National Drinking Water Advisory Council Drinking Water State Revolving Fund Working Group Mission Statement (PDF)(2 pp, 16 K)
    Mission statement and working group roster
  • July 16-17, 1997 NDWAC Drinking Water State Revolving Fund Working Group Meeting Executive Summary (PDF)(1 pg, 24 K, July 16, 1997)
    The first meeting of the National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Drinking Water State Revolving Fund (DWSRF) Working Group was held on July 16-17, 1997, in Washington, D.C.
  • September 17, 1997 NDWAC Drinking Water State Revolving Fund Working Group Meeting Executive Summary (PDF)(2 pp, 19 K, September 17, 1997)
    The second meeting of the National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Drinking Water State Revolving Fund (DWSRF) Working Group was held on September 17, 1997, in Washington, D.C.
item.dc:creator: Anonymous

item.title: National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) Health Care Providers Working Group Summaries
item.description:
A collection of Health Care Providers Working Group documents.  

  • November 2-4, 1999 Strategic Assessment and Recommendations (PDF)(14 pp, 77 K, November 2, 1999)
    At its Spring 1998 meeting, NDWAC discussed the need to forge better links with the community of doctors, nurses, and other health care providers on drinking water concerns. NDWAC called for the establishment of a Working Group on this topic, not to make specific regulatory recommendations, but to examine from a strategic perspective whether the health care provider community needs to become better educated on drinking water issues, and how such an effort might be structured
  • June 1-2, 1999 Meeting of the Health Care Providers Outreach and Education Working Group, National Drinking Water Advisory Council Summary (PDF)(2 pp, 20 K, June 1, 1999)
    The Health Care Providers Outreach and Education Working Group (HCP) of the National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) held its second face-to-face meeting on June 1st and 2nd, 1999
  • December 2-3, 1998 Meeting of the Health Care Providers Outreach and Education Work Group Summary (PDF)(2 pp, 20 K, December 2, 1998)
    The Health Care Provider Outreach and Education Working Group of the National Drinking Water Advisory Council (NDWAC) held its first meeting December 2-3, 1998
  • December 2, 1998 Health Care Provider Outreach & Education Membership (PDF)(5 pp, 20 K, December 2, 1998)
    Health Care Providers Membership Roster
item.dc:creator: Anonymous
